description: These salmon bites are a twist on classic crumbed fish and chips: baked, not fried, fillets become bite-sized morsels and chips are sweet potato fries. Kid-friendly? Tick.
keywords: Almond Crusted Salmon Bites With Sweet Potato Fries
name: Almond Crusted Salmon Bites With Sweet Potato Fries Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 260 g Tassal fresh Tassie salmon skin-off

recipeInstructions.text: Serve salmon bites with sweet potato fries, sweet chilli sauce and lemon wedge and enjoy!
